attributes.action: We the public do not care about the laws on cannabis use in private places and think
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we the public and tax payers DO NOT care about the laws on cannabis use

we see that using cannabis safely and responsibly as bein legal in our eyes and doin nothin wrong when used in pravate places

we do not care about the current states of the prohibition as cannabis to us is already LEGAL

we see nothin wrong with cannabis use and belive it to be a natural herb with medical benifits and meditaional benifits

the age limit of cannabis use should be aged 18 to allow school kids to concentrate on shool and college

we agree cannabis should not be used in public place 

we belive that the public should have more information on safely usein cannabis 

also how to properly identify adulterated cannabis to avoid it 

also that more money should go in to the research of adulterated cannabis on public streets and how we can eradicate this public health problem

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
